document_data.name: Tower Tor
document_data.mainbody: '''Tower Tor''' was a hill in the mid–8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Geography: Until {{yearlink|761}} the [[Walking Tower of Warglend]] was in Tower Tor. There was at least one lake close by.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|761}}, the sage [[Tabarast]] of Moonshorn Tower reported that, amongst other signs from the [[god]]s, the Walking Tower of Warglend had moved for the first time in a thousand years, approximately since {{yearlink|-250}}, and left its place in Tower Tor for the middle of a nearby lake.
